definition: to follow through or carry out a plan without deviation
details:
verb
- to follow through or carry out a plan without deviation
= example: to follow through or carry out a plan without deviation
- to stick to firmly
= example: to stick to firmly
= synonyms: stick
- to be loyal to
= example: to be loyal to
= synonyms: stick
- to be a devoted follower or supporter
= example: to be a devoted follower or supporter
= synonyms: stick
- to be compatible or in accordance with
= example: to be compatible or in accordance with
